author: mattyevans
content:
ğŸ‘‹ To aid with interop, you can now trigger client builds directly from discord.
```
/build trigger {client} {optional:repository} {optional:ref} {optional:docker_tag}
```
- If you do not provide a repository, it will default to your client's standard repository.
- If you do not provide a ref, it will default to your client's standard branch.
- You can specify a custom Docker tag if needed.

It is gated by a few perms, so if you find yourself blocked, reach out to PandaOps.
